Uses of Interface
game.IAction

  • Packages that use IAction 
    Package Description
    game  

    • Uses of IAction in game

      Classes in game that implement IAction 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  ActionChat
      This action allows the player to chat with a character.
      class  ActionDrop
      Action that drops an item from the inventory to the current area.
      class  ActionExits
      The action that shows the exits of the current area.
      class  ActionGo
      The action that allows the player to move to another area.
      class  ActionHelp
      The action that displays the help.
      class  ActionInventory
      The action that prints the items in player's inventory.
      class  ActionInvestigate
      The action that allows the player to investigate an item.
      class  ActionLookAround
      The action that allows the player to look around the area.
      class  ActionMurderer
      The action sets the player's suspect of the murder.
      class  ActionNote
      The action adds a note to the notepad.
      class  ActionPick
      The action picks up an item from the current area and puts it into the inventory.
      class  ActionReadNotes
      The action returns the notes from the notepad.
      class  ActionTerminate
      The action quits the game.
      class  ActionUnlock
      The action unlocks the area in the given direction.
